trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The element associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: O elemento associado a este par de automação.

trans-unit.source: The automation peer that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup" /> that holds the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl" />.
trans-unit.target: O par de automação associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlGroup" /> que contém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome de classe do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The class name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O nome de classe do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Uma enumeração de valor que especifica o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControl" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonControlDataAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que é compatível com o padrão de controle se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> é o valor <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput" />; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.
